arts.ttl: Leverkusen 2-1 Union Berlin (30 de Nov., 2024) Resultado Final
arts.sum: In addition to the above toggle, you may choose to provide the information requested in this opt-out form, which may enable us to take action on your opt-out election more broadly than just on this digital property. Please note that, because these activities are based on online cookies, your opt-out choice is specific to this property.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs. Bayer Leverkusen: DFB Cup probable teams, match stats and LIVE blog!
arts.sum: Bayer have been far more consistent in cup competition, beating Carl-Zeiss Jena and Elversberg by an aggregate score of 4-0 in the opening rounds, and winning three of their first five in the revamped Champions League . Bundesliga leaders Bayern Munich host DFB Cup holders Bayer Leverkusen in a huge last-16 encounter at the Allianz Arena on Tuesday (kick-off: 8.45pm CET).

arts.ttl: Patrik Schick seals victory for Bayer Leverkusen at Union Berlin
arts.sum: Patrik Schick put away a brilliant Florian Wirtz cross as Bayer Leverkusen claimed a 2-1 win away at Union Berlin. This goal ended Union's 322-minute scoring drought in the Bundesliga and injected new life into the match.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen star confirms interest in La Liga return following past Barcelona talks
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen midfielder Aleix Garcia has confirmed interest in returning to La Liga in the future, having been the subject of summer transfer interest from Barcelona.

arts.ttl: “Xabi Alonso won’t be able to say no to Real Madrid”
arts.sum: Now, the midfielder reflects on what it’s like to work with the Spanish coach in an interview with Mundo Deportivo : “Having been a player himself, he really understands the dynamics of the locker room and how to connect with players on a personal level. Aleix García concluded by discussing his transition to Germany: “When you move to a new country and culture, it always takes a bit of time to adap t, but with Xabi Alonso as the coach and Spanish being spoken in the Leverkusen locker room, it’s been easier.

arts.ttl: Bayern edge ahead of Real Madrid in the race for Florian Wirtz
arts.sum: But the Spanish giants have fallen off the pace according to The Athletic : Leverkusen are demanding more than 100 million euros (around 1.05 million dollars) for the 21-year-old striker - a figure that considerably complicates the Madrid’s aspirations. In addition to that, there is always the possibility that Xabi Alonso could return to his old club to take over the reins from Carlo Ancelotti next year.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs. Bayer Leverkusen preview: Champions targeting away day success
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will look to claim their first Bundesliga away win since September when they travel to the Stadion An der Alten Försterei for Saturday’s clash with Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Haaland and Rodri nominated for Fifa men's award
arts.sum: Manchester City's Rodri and Erling Haaland are nominated in the best male player category at the 2024 Fifa Best Awards.

arts.ttl: Preview: Union Berlin vs. Bayer Leverkusen - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Union Berlin and Bayer Leverkusen, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Patrik Schick, Harry Kane, Robert Lewandowski and players to score a perfect hat-trick in the Bundesliga
arts.sum: And there have been no fewer than 31 perfect hat-tricks in the Bundesliga since official data collection began back in 1992, starting with Karlsruhe's Sergei Kiriakov in 1993 and including such luminaries as Giovane Élber, Claudio Pizarro, Mario Gómez, Chicharito, Lewandowski, Harry Kane and of course Schick . In a campaign that saw him score a division record 41 league goals for Bayern - including three hat-tricks and one four-goal turn - Lewandowski refused to let the empty stadia of the COVID era stop him and he proved 'perfect' in big wins against Eintracht Frankfurt ( 5-0 ) and then Stuttgart ( 4-0 ).
